2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: The new Murder Store is having a grand reopening in Buckaroo! But a returning serial killer has other plans…

Master Yoda finds himself overpowered and captured!

Imprisoned within the caves, the master must become a student once more.

Plus...Ben and Luke feel the ripples of the Jedi Master's tale!

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: In their darkest hour of need, a new hero rises to fight alongside the Dimensionauts.

'TIL DEATH DO US... Part 1 (of 6)

Deadpool's whirlwind romance with Shiklah was one of the most exciting times of his life. Traveling across the world, fighting all sorts of threats at her side, and finally marrying her as a way to thwart the evil vampire lord, Dracula. But since then, the reality has set in. Shiklah is a demon succubus, and more than that, the Queen of the monster kingdom hidden beneath Manhattan...and the problems between them continue to pile up.

Now, when an affront to Shiklah's people demands justice, a line is crossed. As the Monster Metropolis declares war on the surface world, Deadpool must choose between the wife to whom he's pledged himself and the role he's been crafting for himself as a hero. Also featuring Spider-Man and the Mercs for Money, this is one domestic dispute that's really going to break some things up.

Written by Gerry Duggan (DEADPOOL, UNCANNY AVENGERS), Joshua Corin (DEADPOOL: TOO SOON) and Christopher Hastings (GWENPOOL, VOTE LOKI) and with art by Deadpool all-stars Salva Espin, Scott Koblish, Iban Coello and Reilly Brown on covers.

The Road to Salvation, Part 4 of 4

Heartbroken and emotionally damaged, Aimee is determined to destroy Salvation with plans of extracting bloody vengeance. Can our heroes stop her and save the innocent survivors while a massive horde of Neo Zombies threaten to tear them all to shreds?

Saya’s mysterious savior offers her a deal that will change Kings Dominion forever. But it’s a contract signed in blood…

OSBORN VS. SPIDER-MAN! NO HOLDS BARRED!

The outcome of this battle will change both of these men.

And that's nothing to say of Osborn's master plan that Spider-Man is powerless to save! ONLY SILVER SABLE AND MOCKINGBIRD STAND A CHANCE!
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: The Osborn Identity Part Four: One-On-One

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
“HIS GROWING FLOCK”

Reverend Anderson has become the center of attention as more and more people start to see his side of things. Will this help Kyle’s cause—or hurt it? Kyle needs to figure it out fast, because the fate of the world rests on his shoulders.
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: His Growing Flock

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: How can Supergirl convince Power Girl that she is not fighting an enemy—but a sister? Plus, Lois Lane and the Reaper make their way to Hugo Strange’s lab to stop his “superweapon,” unaware that it’s Power Girl herself!

THE DOLL Part Seven.

Will Saunders joins in on family vacation and finally gets the chance to spend some time alone with Isabelle.
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: The Doll Part 7 of 9

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: The cosmic craziness continues! Iron Man pays a visit to Ego the Living Planet (a major character in the upcoming Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2)! But what secrets does the Galactic Giant hold? And what is it that Captain America doesn't want Iron Man to take back to Earth?

Guest editor “Toxic” Tommy O’Brien gather’s Pre-Code grisly, gory, goodies by his favorite horror comics art masters! Eyeball searing monsterpieces: “The Corpse Who Came to Dinner”, “The Day the World Died”, “Land of the Living Dead”, “The Werewolf Lurks”, “Taylor of Death” and more!
What’s the secret of the shed in the back of the girls’ house, and why are strange men visiting it in the middle of the night?!

“The Bodacious Butterfly Trail,” Part 2 of 2! A centuries-old bug with a built-in treasure map is leading Scrooge McDuck to fortunes untold—but now the terrible Beagle Boys might be one step ahead!

Story Title

  • The Bodacious Butterfly Trail (Part 2 of 2) (from Italian Topolino 328, 1962)

OH MY GOD IT'S INTERDIMENSIONAL CABLE TIME!

Rick and Morty are wanted fugitives in an alien dimension, so until the heat dies down, there's not much to do but watch interdimensional cable! Can you even believe it? A special one-shot issue drawn by writer Kyle Starks (with a special cameo by Andy Hirsch)! Meanwhile, Jerry learns a painful lesson in film history in this issue's back-up comic drawn by Marc Ellerby!

The gang uncovers a tale of their great-great-grandparents (and grand-dog!) in the old West. When monstrous rumors bring the Weirdness Wagon to town, will they find a fearsome beast, or just come face-to-scarred-face with the lawman Jonah Hex?

The clash between The Joker and the Riddler continues to escalate, with the rest of the city’s villains picking sides and joining in. In the midst of the battle, Batman must try to save whoever he can while knowing he will forever be haunted by those he can’t.

Metropolis is Oliver Queen’s next stop on his quest to take down the Ninth Circle, but he may be too late when the evil financiers start a war with the one man they can’t buy: Lex Luthor! That’s more fat cats than even Ollie can handle, which means this is a job for Superman and Green Arrow!

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
76 pages of action-packed arachnid-adventure! Only £3.99!

A Clone Conspiracy chapter! Prowler is dying! But Electro is gonna make sure he’s dead!

Also, the Jackal shows Spider-Man the reality of his dream! And Kaine prisoner of Doctor Octopus and The Lizard!

Plus, a Civil War II chapter! Spider-Man versus Hulk!

By Sean Ryan, Jamal Campbell, Javier Saltares, Dan Slott, Jim Cheung, Brian Michael Bendis and Nico Leon.

Includes material reprinted from Prowler #3, The Clone Conspiracy #4 and Spider-Man: Miles Morales #7.

“LEGACY” part three! An outside threat has followed the League’s children back from the future in order to destroy them. His name is Arthur Curry, and he will not stop until they are all dead!

Hal must secure Highfather if the Green Lantern Corps’ plan to protect him and the universe has a chance of survival! Can the greatest pilot in the universe chase down a god who moves at the speed of light?

CLINT BARTON joins LOGAN on his mission to stop the MAESTRO!

But with Maestro's plan reaching Phase Two, they might be too late to stop the annihilation!

“UNDERWORLD” finale! Caught in the claws of the monstrous crustacean crime baron known as Crush, Aquaman and Dolphin are bargaining chips in a most dangerous game with the cruel King Rath, who’ll do anything to keep the secret of Arthur’s survival from the people of Atlantis. Meanwhile, Mera’s mission to break into the sealed kingdom hits a rough patch when Atlantis’ magical technology short circuits on a massive scale—especially those devices made of a certain metal...

“Vote Harley” part one! The corrupt mayor of New York City has been a thorn in Harley’s side since the day he stepped into office…and now he’s crossed the line one time too many! Harley’s usual methods of dealing with problems like this have failed her, so it’s time for a more unconventional solution…is New York City ready for Mayor Harley Quinn? It better be!

Archie and his friends all think they’re the inspiration behind the recipe, but only one person knows the truth!

In the aftermath of The Whisperer War—ALL IS LOST.

Collects THE WALKING DEAD #163-168.

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
The enemy leading the tempest, part three.

Thanks to the properties of Thunder Girl's body, Balthazaar has arrived on Luna, determined to take possession of the Artisan's resources and use them against his "twin." But before that, the vicious creature has to deal with Attikus, Zudhra, and Eurialis.
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: The Enemy Leading the Tempest, Part Three

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
STARS AND GARTERS Part 1

Part Avengers and part X-Men. Two of Earth's mightiest heroes and two of Earth's mightiest friends. And when it comes to super-heroics, Wonder Man and the Beast have seen it, done it, and they got the T-shirt. When the world throws you cosmic conflict, global calamity, death, rebirth and heartache aplenty, it's important to remember where your friends are. Join us for "A Pint or Two," won't you? PLUS: Includes 3 bonus MARVEL PRIMER PAGES! Story by Robbie Thompson and a TBA artist!

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: Batman faces a committee that’s determined to find out whether or not he colluded in the assassination of the President in order to put a more compliant ally in the White House. An old ally returns to make the Dark Knight’s life more complicated and Batman reveals an ominous bit of new technology.
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: The Trial of Bruce Wayne

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
“THE SECRET HISTORY OF TASK FORCE X” part two! Strapped to a rocket, sent into orbit and dumped unceremoniously into a decrepit old satellite floating hundreds of miles above the earth, things have never seemed worse for the Suicide Squad—at least until they’re set upon by an incredibly deadly alien monster. Yeah, that’s worse. But at the heart of the mysterious space station hides a pair of long-lost DC characters ready to shake Task Force X to its very foundation.

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description:
THE EPIC CONCLUSION TO "LAND OF THE BLIND!"

It's devil vs. devil, as DAREDEVIL battles THE BEAST, demonic source of power for the Hand clan - winner takes soul!

Also: The next phase of DAREDEVIL's story begins here, with the payoff to over two years of storytelling. The last page will rock the Marvel Universe!
2017-01-01|2017-12-30.name: Land of the Blind Conclusion

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: Translates Star Wars #28.
The Rhodes family’s recent adventures have exposed the world to the existence of magic…and now they have a brand-new threat hunting them down.

Emmy finally comes face-to-face with her evil counterpart. With everything that she's learned from the Family, and the power of her friends' support, Emmy knows that she's strong enough to defeat this threat to her home. But is she willing to sacrifice her own integrity for victory in this fight?

ORPHANS OF X Part 4

WOLVERINE has been stalked, hunted and surveilled by THE ORPHANS OF X, a group that will stop at nothing to kill her and DAKEN...including re-forging the horrible MURAMASA BLADE.

Now, LAURA will have to delve deep into LOGAN's history in order to find a weapon with which to fight back, and save her family.

2017-01-01|2017-12-30.description: Sawako decides to take the entrance exam for a university in Sapporo, while Kazehaya has chosen to attend a college near home. The couple realize there aren’t that many high school days left—will they move into the future together or apart?
